  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120787</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Daljnogled</string>
            <string language="en">Telescope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teleskop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Télescope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Telescópio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Telescopio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τηλεσκόπιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Telescopio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Zorni kot pod katerim vidimo predmet, uporaba povečevalnega stekla in princip daljnogleda.</string>
            <string language="en">Viewing angle of the object, usage of magnifying glass to increase this angle and principle used in telescope.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zorni kot</string>
            <string language="en">viewing angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">daljnogled</string>
            <string language="en">telescope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">optična aplikacija</string>
            <string language="en">optical application</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrachtung Winkel der Nachricht, Verbrauch des 
Vergrößerungsglases, zum dieses Winkels und Grundregel zu erhöhen 
verwendet im Teleskop.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angle de visionnement de l'objet, utilisation de 
la loupe pour augmenter ces angle et principe utilisés dans le 
télescope.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulo do objeto, uso da visão do vidro 
ampliando para aumentar estes ângulo e princípio usados no 
telescópio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Angolo dell'oggetto, uso di osservazione della 
lente d'ingrandimento per aumentare questi angolo e principio usati in
telescopio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γωνία όψης του αντικειμένου, χρήση του ενισχύοντας 
γυαλιού για να αυξήσει αυτές τις γωνία και αρχή που 
χρησιμοποιούνται στο τηλεσκόπιο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ángulo del objeto, uso de la visión de la lupa 
para aumentar este ángulo y principio usados en telescopio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrachtung Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teleskop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Anwendung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle de visionnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">télescope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">application optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo da visão</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">telescópio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">aplicação ótica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo di osservazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">telescopio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">applicazione ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γωνία όψης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τηλεσκόπιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οπτική εφαρμογή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ángulo de la visión</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">telescopio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aplicación óptica</string>
          </keyword>
